name: Dashlet
description: The component allows you to add a dashlet to your UI-Builder application

properties.name: title
properties.label: Title
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining the title of dashlet
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the title for the dashlet.

properties.name: styleVariant
properties.label: Style Variant
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the variety of styles for dashlet.

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining the height of dashlet

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining the width of dashlet

properties.name: localStorageEnabled
properties.label: Local Storage Enabled
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining whether the state (size, position, closed or open) of a dashlet is allowed to be stored in local storage or not
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine whether the state (size, position, closed or open) of a dashlet is allowed to be stored in Local Storage or not.

properties.name: resizing
properties.label: Resizing
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining whether resizing is allowed or not
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine whether resizing is allowed or not.

properties.name: draggable
properties.label: Draggable
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining whether dragging is allowed or not
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine whether dragging is allowed or not.

properties.name: contextBlocks
properties.label: Context Blocks
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining context blocks for dashlet
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine context block. Signature of context block: `{type, label, content}`.

properties.name: minWidth
properties.label: Min Width
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining the min-width of dashlet

properties.name: maxWidth
properties.label: Max Width
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining the max-width of dashlet

properties.name: minHeight
properties.label: Min Height
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining the min-height of dashlet

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.label: Max Height
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic of determining the max-height of dashlet

eventHandlers.name: contextBlocksHandler
eventHandlers.label: Context Blocks Handler
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the user clicks on actions in the context block of the dashlet.
